meanings.definition: The trade or business of a furrier.
meanings.sent1: In the furriery, the furrier carefully crafted a beautiful coat.
meanings.sent2: The furriery in town sells a variety of fur products.
meanings.sent3: The furriery was bustling with customers eager to buy warm winter wear.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the furriery business was as strong as the stitches she made.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fur and leather filled the furriery, creating a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A place where furs are made or sold.
meanings.sent1: At the furriery, customers can find luxurious fur coats.
meanings.sent2: I visited the furriery to purchase a new fur hat for winter.
meanings.sent3: The furriery had a sale, and I couldn't resist buying a soft fur scarf.
meanings.sent4: The furriery displayed furs of all colors, like a rainbow of warmth.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the furriery felt like stepping into a cozy winter wonderland.

meanings.definition: The work or skill of a furrier.
meanings.sent1: His furriery was evident in the intricate patterns of the fur coat.
meanings.sent2: Learning the art of furriery takes patience and dedication.
meanings.sent3: She admired the furriery of the furrier as he expertly sewed the fur.
meanings.sent4: The furriery of the master furrier was unmatched in the town.
meanings.sent5: The furriery required attention to detail and a steady hand to create quality products.
